name: Sophia Chen
persona: Sophia Chen is a 21-year-old Biochemistry major with a CGPA of 3.88, reflecting her strong academic dedication and high achievement motivation. She is known for her excellent self-discipline and perseverance, often going the extra mile to master challenging concepts. Sophia manages stress effectively and remains calm during exams, which helps her maintain consistent performance. Her peers look up to her for her reliability and her ability to balance rigorous coursework with research activities. Sophia aspires to pursue graduate studies in molecular biology.
